metadata.synopsis: An Italian bride (Sophia Loren) finds her long-lost soldier husband (Marcello Mastroianni) living in Moscow with amnesia and a wife (Lyudmila Saveleva) and daughter.

reviews: A grand, even pulpy entertainment, filled with underlined emotions and tragic romance.
Chetnal fortuna-the pornography of sex cannot be replaced by the opera of soap.
Excellent drama, with Sophia Loren at the peak of her powers.
